cause.description:
Its a disorder that overlooked that we should all support. At the moment there are very few medicines to treat the different types of seizures. Less than 25 exist. The support for research is greatly needed that so someday all epilptics can live seizures free days. The more the support we can get for these people the better.
Here is a website where you can purchase bracelets and other things: www.epilepsynse.org.uk.
1. It must be helped cause it effects peoples lives.
2. It could affect anybody around you.
3. We are so close to finding a cure for some types of epilepsy!
cause.mission: Find a Cure or a Better Treatment for Epilepsy So That Not Another Life or Minute is Lost to It.
cause.name: Epilepsy: Finding a Cure
